task.title: Discarding your changes
task.shortdesc: If you decide that one or more of the modifications you made should be discarded, use the Discard action available in the context menu.

step.cmd: In the Git Staging view, select the file or files with the modifications that you want to discard.
Right-click the selected files and click Discard.
Confirm your choice by clicking Yes.

taskbody.result: Discarding changes in tracked file reverts it to its previous state. Discarding an untracked file deletes it from your project directory.
